parameters.description: ID of group from which to get principals

parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group principals by principal `username` using string contains search.

parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group roles by role `name` using string contains search.

parameters.name: role_description
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group roles by role `description` using string contains search.

parameters.description: Parameter for add list of fields to display for roles.

parameters.description: The application name to obtain access for the principal

parameters.description: Unique username of the principal to obtain access for (only available for admins, and if supplied, takes precedence over the identity header).
